Text.Page: My hammer swings for the Iron Order.
Alliances form because the federation doesn't pay attention to the people's needs.
Until the exarch changes the policy, I offer bronze quality enchanting. Stop worrying! My bronze enchanting is more successful than any average person's enchanting.

Ah, an up-and-coming <PCclass:lcase>. You'll use my services soon. I can tell.
